title: User Locator 1.0 - (Motivate Systems)
description:
*******************************************************************************
           	  User Locator 1.0  (c) 2008 Motivate Systems
*******************************************************************************


Release: User Locator 1.0

Date: 07/09/2008

Cracked By: Nixkap



Type.................: Utility
Platform.............: XP/W2K3/Vista
Serial #.............: None
Compression Format...: Zip
Copy Protection......: Serial



RELEASE NOTES


     	User Locator instantly finds computers that users are logged onto.
	Search for any user account in your Active Directory domain and the
	results are immediate. It doesn&#039;t matter if users are logged onto
	multiple computers. All detected logon sessions will be displayed.

	If that&#039;s not enough, powerful administrative tools are activated with
	one click! You save time by connecting directly to the remote computer.

	Common tasks like launching Computer Management, connecting to the C$ 
	Admin share , and initiating direct Remote Desktop connections are
	included. On top of that, custom reports provide valuable information
	in seconds. You can view all running processes or installed applications
	on the remote computer. Even a remote command prompt is at your 
        finger tips.

	User Locator is one of the smallest and most powerful tools we offer.
	No installation is necessary. Simply drag and drop the exe or keep it on
	your USB key for maximum convenience. Run it from any computer in your   
        domain.
	
	You&#039;ll use it every day, multiple times a day! 
	
	Supports Microsoft Windows Vista, XP, W2K, W2K3 and Windows 2008 systems. 


For More Info on User Locator Visit:
       <a href=" http://www.motivatesystems.com/User_Locator.asp" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.motivatesystems.com/User_Locator.asp</a>


INSTALLATION NOTES

	- Run "User Locator 1.0.exe".
	- Go to "Setup" / "License Key" then type anything (even just a space)
        - That&#039;s it, Enjoy!
